channel.title: Recoloring models
channel.description: I'm not sure if I should put this in client help or the rs models section, but I have some custom items that I want to recolor (317 PI) and i need to know how to find the original model colors to be able to do the recolor. does anybody know an easy way to get the # of the color of the customs?

item.title: Recoloring models
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

I think you can do this through a modelling program, maybe metasequoia?

Read full topic
